Description:
You enter the cultists' main base where you meet their high chancellor, Erekhal, along with a few cultists waiting for his order to attack you.

Erekhal seems willing to see what you want from him.

You have entered their base and killed many cultists along the way to get here, so there is no chance of leaving without a fight.
DescriptionAction: What are you going to do?

    "SSRewardText": "(Erekhal) \"No, he abandoned us! Now the burning hand is mine, and even if you are the queen of Senenthia you will not take from me what I have rebuilt!\"\n\n(Amelia) \"You are still an ungrateful child... you still don't see all that he sacrificed to save Velkarath? I am in a hurry and you leave me no choice, so I will put an end to this cult of yours once and for all!\"\n\nAfter seeing Amelia's determination, several of Erekhal's followers flee from the combat.",
